sense.name: part of a social unit
sense.examples: Mary introduced me to all her family members. Only members will be admitted to this club. Mrs. Watson is a member of the faculty. The United Nations' members include Canada. The library is a member of the Interlibrary Loan Association.

sense.name: physical portion of anatomy
sense.examples: Keep all your members away from that rotating saw. The pervert flashed his member at the audience.

sense.name: constituent element of a larger class
sense.examples: Snakes are members of the class Reptilia. Mary had a hard time meeting members of the opposite sex. 'i' is a member of the set of imaginary numbers.
